page.title: 10Health Care in Strathmiglo
page.content: Strathmiglo has a Doctor's surgery.It is open on Tuesdays and Thursdays between the hours of 10_11am and 4.30_6pm.At other times if anyone needs to see a doctor,it is neccesary to go to the main surgery in Auchtermuchty which is about 2.5 kms away.For people who do not have a car,getting to Auchtermuchty can be a bit of a problem.The bus service is infrequent and they often have to rely on a neighbour's help to get there. There isn't a dentist here.The nearest dentist is in Auchtermuchty,though many people go to Dundee,Kinross,Cupar and Glenrothes.The school dentist comes once a year with his mobile surgery and attends to the teeth ofthe children. The nearest hospitals are in Kirkcaldy,Bridge of Earn and Perth.It is difficult for people who do not have a car to get to these hospitals.
